weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not a bird. I help the flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm wet!
☔️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants love me!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the sky. I make you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am bright.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Flowers turn to face me.

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm very cold.
🧤 You can make snowballs with me.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I move the trees and make kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I can rustle leaves.

weather.question: I am gray and puffy and float in the sky. I sometimes bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can be different shapes.
🌧️ Sometimes I make it rain.
🐑 I look like sheep.

weather.question: I am hot and bright but go away in the evenings. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give light during the day
☀️ You feel my warmth on your skin
😎 You use sunscreen when I'm out.

weather.question: I'm like rain, but I'm frozen. I can hurt if I hit you hard. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm made of ice.
🤕 It hurts when I fall on you.
🥶 I'm very very cold.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, often followed by a loud noise. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am bright
⚡️ I come with thunder.
⛈️ I appear during a storm

weather.question: After the rain, when the sun shines, I appear with many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I show up after rain and sun.
✨I am like a colorful arc in the sky.

weather.question: I am the sound you hear after you see lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I am very loud!
🌩️ I come after lightning.
💥 I rumble in the sky.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys like me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of the sun!
🐒 Monkeys love to eat me.
💪 Eating me gives you lots of energy!

food.question: I am round and red, and you can bite into me. Sometimes I'm green! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I can be a yummy snack.
🌳 I grow on a tree.
🍎 Snow White really liked me, maybe a little too much!

food.question: I am white and cold, and yummy with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a cow.
🥛 You drink me.
🍪 I go great with chocolate chip cookies!

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me!
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyes.

food.question: I am long and green, and you eat me in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on a plant.
💚 I am the color of grass.
🥢 You can eat me right out of my shell.

food.question: I am small, round, and juicy. I grow in bunches on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I can be green, red, or purple!
🍷 Some people make juice or wine with me.
🧺 You can find me in a basket.

food.question: I am brown on the outside and white or yellow inside. You can mash me and eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I grow under the ground.
🍟 You can make fries with me!
🥣 Some people like to mash me with milk.

food.question: I am yellow and grow on a cob. You can eat me on the grill. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am a vegetable.
🔥 You can cook me on a grill.
🍿 You can pop me and eat me at the movies!

food.question: I am orange and juicy. You can peel me to eat me in sections. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am a citrus fruit.
💪 I am full of Vitamin C!
🌕 I look like a little orange sun.

food.question: I am round and green on the outside, with a red inside and black seeds. I am very refreshing in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am a very big fruit.
🏖️ You might eat me at the beach.
💦 I am mostly water!
